import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export default function Navbar() { let[user,setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ let users = localStorage.getItem("user") let user_data = JSON.parse(users) console.log("hi") console.log(JSON.parse(users)) setUser({...user_data}) },[]) function handleLogout(){ localStorage.removeItem("user",null) } return ( <>
Chat
  • Home
  • Link
  • About Us
  • Users
{user!==null? <> {user.name} Logout : <> Register Sign In }
) }
